Bisharp (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0624: Pawniard
Pokémon
#0626: Bouffalant →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Bisharp (TCG Pocket).

Bisharp has been featured on 19 different cards since it debuted in the Noble Victories expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Bisharp cards are normally Darkness-type or Metal-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Bisharp

Bisharp
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
